brewery.brewery_description:
“In its mighty midst, sits Moorhouse's Brewery, famous for its mystical beers all brewed in the shadow of Pendle Hill.” #MysticalBeers

Renowned locally for our mysterious and mystical beers, Moorhouses is synonymous with the myths and legends of Pendle Hill.

At the heart of what we do is our state-of-the-art brewery which combines our brewers’ craft with the innovation and new techniques of today. We’re beer lovers with discerning standards and every pint is brewed to perfection, for you to enjoy.

Our beers have gained accolades both nationally and internationally, and many of them are multi-award winning - we always like it when we see them being recognised over a number of years, as it’s all about consistency and trust!

items.checkin_comment: Tastes like Turkish delight. But it’s not bad. Won the first round of the quiz. Happy

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 150 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 31!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 100 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 21!
Had enough tea and biscuits? Head to the pub for a pint! That's at least 60 beers from the UK. Try 5 more for Level 13.

While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 50 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 11!

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 435 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 88!

Sometimes you need a break from all the hops, fruits, and spices. What better way than with a crisp, smooth Blonde Ale or Golden Ale? Basic but delicious. That's 35 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale or Golden Ale. Try 5 more for Level 8!

beer.beer_description: A refreshing golden ale to get you into the festive spirit. Aromas of citrus fruits balanced by English Maris Otter malt.
A punchy, full-bodied blonde ale with a distinct fruit taste and citrus hop finish.
A refreshing, easy drinking blonde ale with a grapefruit aroma and a fresh citrus taste.
A bold, malty amber beer with spice fruit notes and crisp fruity aftertaste.
An extremely satisfying light amber ale that is balanced with biscuit malt and hops to give a delectably dry taste.
A legendary black mild with a distinct chocolate malt taste and a hop fruit finish.

A refreshingly clean tasting golden ale with aromas
of citrus fruits and grapefruit, and a smooth malt
balance complemented by subtle bitterness.

A light golden ale, single hopped with American Citra to showcase this hop intense aromas of tropical fruit,
mango and pineapple. Maris Otter provides a hint of
background biscuit malt flavour, leading to a strong yet easy drinking bitterness
An East Lancashire session ale with a biscuit malt aroma and a strong hop bitterness.
An amber ale, initial dryness mellowing to give delicate fruit flavours and a lingering finish.

A modern bitter with a 3.8% ABV, rich amber in colour with aromas of tangy pink grapefruit and pine. Flavours of dried fruits and a sweet caramel malt balance.

In partnership with Six Connections, a Burnley-based mental health organisation, we have designed a beer to encourage open conversations about mental health. Aiming to break the silence and stigma surrounding mental health by starting the conversation early, well before it gets to crisis point.
A golden ale with a strong fruit body, full flavoured, balanced with a smooth distinctive warm finish.
This new amber-red ale has aromas of rich and sweet malts, resinous pine and citrus, leading to caramel and toasted malt flavours, balanced by a moderate bitterness.
A rich, golden session ale, smooth and balanced with an initial fruit palate and a slightly dry finish.

Our award-winning Session IPA, designed for optimum flavour and aroma. We’ve used Maris Otter with additions of wheat malt and oats to give a full mouthfeel. 
Heaps of Mosaic and Citra hops bring intense flavours of tropical fruits, lychee and orchard stone fruits ending with a rounded, bitter finish.
A strong dark mild with deep complex notes of roasted coffee, chocolate & mocha, balanced by hints of dark cherry and blackcurrant.
The lemon and lime overtones combine with palette cleansing freshness and a citrus aroma for a refreshing taste.
A refreshing golden ale to get you into the festive spirit. Aromas of citrus fruits balanced by English Maris Otter malt.

WE'VE KEPT IT SIMPLE. SQUID INK IS A NO-NONSENSE STOUT, DARK IN COLOUR AND DELICIOUSLY SMOOTH WITH ROASTED MALT FLAVOURS AND A LIGHT AROMA. EXPECT A LONG, DRY FINISH.
Contains lactose.
Clean tasting with a hint of passionfruit and citrus flavours.
An amber ale, initial dryness mellowing to give a delicate fruit flavour and a lingering finish.

Named after the Dotterel, the jewel of Pendle Hill, which has seen its numbers greatly decline in recent years. The hill is one of the most important spring passage sites in England for this species.

A refreshing, easy drinking pale ale with tropical and citrus aromas, subtle malt flavours and pleasant bitterness.

A smooth, hazy New England IPA with a soft bitterness and big hop juiciness. Delicious aromas of tropical fruits and passionfruit the from Galaxy, Citra and Mosaic hops are balanced with Maris Otter and Flaked Oats for a pillowy mouthfeel. 
Un-filtered, just as nature intended.
A juicy, citrus style golden session ale, with refreshing citrus, lemon and orange peel flavours.
Cyro Citra, Amarillo hops & Blood Orange concentrate combine for an IPA packed with orange, citrus flavour & full tangy bitterness.
